alert.note: Alert for Parker; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:26AM CDT until June 13 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Wise County in north central Texas... Northeastern Parker County in north central Texas... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 526 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Poolville, or 13 miles southwest of Bridgeport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Briar, Reno, Springtown, New Fairview, Aurora, Boyd, Poolville, Paradise, Lake Bridgeport, Runaway Bay, Sanctuary, La Junta, Cottondale, Keeter, Balsora, Agnes, Boonsville and Highland Addition. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
